name: World of Blanks
description:
CHARACTER SELECT: To select your character, press your Reload buttons. the default for player 1 is E, player 2 is Right Alt. Makes sense on my mac, apologies, we will have this in game soon. Only after both buttons have been pressed will the game begin!

Player 1:

  • W: Jump
  • A: Left
  • D: Right
  • S: Shoot
  • E: Reload (To Be Implemented)

Player 2:

  • Up: Jump
  • Left: Left
  • Right: Right
  • Down: Shoot
  • Right Alt: Reload (To Be Implemented)
